main event: A local resident at Waikiki Beach, Hawaii reported seeing a round, white, luminous object hovering in the sky for about 5 minutes on June 8, 1959.
interesting points: The object was approximately the size of a baseball and emitted a steady glow., The object moved diagonally to the left before disappearing from view., No sound was heard during the observation., The weather conditions were clear, allowing for a good view of the object., The sighting lasted around 5 minutes.
